# Packages

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
library(magrittr)
```


# Data

## Load
```{r}
act_data <- read.delim("../Data/actg320.txt", header = T, sep = "\t")
log_data <-  read.delim("../Data/Logistic.txt", header = T, sep = "\t")
summary(act_data)
summary(log_data)
```

## Plot


```{r}
pairplot_act  <- ggpairs(act_data)
ggsave("Plots/pairplot_act.png", pairplot_act)
```
